content: with this pattern you will be able to make as many baby squids as you want this is the perfect project for advanced beginner crocheters you will receive two pdf english & french difficulty advanced beginner skills required crocheting in spiral magic_ring chain slip_stitch single_crochet stitch half_double_crochet stitch double_crochet stitch increasing and decreasing materials about 11g of #6 bulky yarn weight you can use any yarn for this project suggested yarns parfait chunky honey bunny baby snuggle himalayan dolphin paintbox chenille etc 4mm crochet hook 10mm safety eyes polyester fiberfill for stuffing yarn needle scissors stitch markers final size they are about 8 cm 3 5 high when made with indicated yarn copyright © 2025 content of this document may not be copied reproduced altered published or distributed in any way you may sell finished products made with this pattern provided credit to all from jade
